item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: TLDR: We do not use cookies and we do not collect any personal data. Website visitors # No personal information is collected. No information is stored in the browser. No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties. No information is shared with advertising companies. No information is mined and harvested for personal and behavioral trends. No information is monetized. Matomo # Diese Website nutzt Matomo aus rein didaktisch-wissenschaftlichen Gr√ºnden.
